verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven,<s%> whose <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> to whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2803>imputes<s%> not <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7423>guile.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> I <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silence,<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> through my <S%H7581>roaring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on me: my <S%H3955>moisture<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into the <S%H2725>drought<s%> of <S%H7019>summer.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

I <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> to you, and my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> have I not <S%H3680>hid.<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and you <S%H5375>forgave<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

For <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> to you in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when you may be <S%H4672>found:<s%> <S%H7535>surely<s%> in the <S%H7858>floods<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> they shall not <S%H5060>come<s%> <S%H5060>near<s%> to him.

You are my <S%H5643>hiding<s%> place; you shall <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H6862>trouble;<s%> you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> me about with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> you and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go:<s%> I will <S%H3289>guide<s%> you with my <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

Be you not as the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> or as the <S%H6505>mule,<s%> which have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H995>understanding:<s%> whose <S%H5716>mouth<s%> must be <S%H1102>held<s%> in with <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle,<s%> <S%H1077>lest<s%> they <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to you.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> shall be to the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> but he that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> him about.

Be <S%H8056>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1524>rejoice,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%> for joy, <S%H3605>all<s%> you that are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
